paragraphs.content: The elders which are among you I exhort, who am also an elder, and a witness of the sufferings of Christ, and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed:
paragraphs.contentHtml: The elders which are among you I exhort, who am also an elder, and a witness of the sufferings of Christ, and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed:

paragraphs.content: Feed the flock of God which is among you, taking the oversight thereof, not by constraint, but willingly; not for filthy lucre, but of a ready mind;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Feed the flock of God which is among you, taking the oversight thereof, not by constraint, but willingly; not for filthy lucre, but of a ready mind;

paragraphs.content: Neither as being lords over God’s heritage, but being ensamples to the flock.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Neither as being lords over God’s heritage, but being ensamples to the flock.

paragraphs.content: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear, ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear, ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away.

paragraphs.content: Likewise, ye younger, submit yourselves unto the elder. Yea, all of you be subject one to another, and be clothed with humility: for God resisteth the proud, and giveth grace to the humble.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Likewise, ye younger, submit yourselves unto the elder. Yea, all of you be subject one to another, and be clothed with humility: for God resisteth the proud, and giveth grace to the humble.

paragraphs.content: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time:

paragraphs.content: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.

paragraphs.content: Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour:

paragraphs.content: Whom resist steadfast in the faith, knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Whom resist steadfast in the faith, knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world.

paragraphs.content: But the God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But the God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.

paragraphs.content: To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.

paragraphs.content: By Silvanus, a faithful brother unto you, as I suppose, I have written briefly, exhorting, and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand.
paragraphs.contentHtml: By Silvanus, a faithful brother unto you, as I suppose, I have written briefly, exhorting, and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand.

paragraphs.content: The church that is at Babylon, elected together with you, saluteth you; and so doth Marcus my son.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The church that is at Babylon, elected together with you, saluteth you; and so doth Marcus my son.

paragraphs.content: Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity. Peace be with you all that are in Christ Jesus. Amen.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity. Peace be with you all that are in Christ Jesus. Amen.
